title: T_ME_3
treatment_protocol_ch1: CRISPR-Cas9 mediated mutagenesis to introduce disease-specific mutations
growth_protocol_ch1: HSPCs were collected at day 12 following hematopoeitic differentiation by using STEMdiff hematopoeitic kit, StemCell Technologies. For generating megakaryocytes, differenitation was stopped at day 10 and floating cells were collected and resuspended in megakaryocytic lineage expansion media (StemCell Technologies).
extract_protocol_ch1: Total RNA was isolated from indicated cells using Qiagen Rneasy Plus Micro kit
extract_protocol_ch1.1: RNA library preparations, sequencing reactions, and initial bioinformatics analysis were conducted at GENEWIZ, LLC. (South Plainfield, NJ, USA).
data_processing: HiSeq Control Software for base calling
data_processing.1: RNA-Seq reads were aligned to human reference genome hg38 with STAR
data_processing.2: Number of read counts per gene locus was summarized using 'featureCounts' using hg38 annotation
data_processing.3: Read counts normalized using TMM normalization (edgeR)
data_processing.5: Supplementary_files_format_and_content: Tab delimited text file with TMM normalized read counts
